counter.name: GPU Time Elapsed
counter.description: Time elapsed on the GPU during the measurement.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: GPU Core Clocks
counter.description: The total number of GPU core clocks elapsed during the measurement.

counter.name: AVG GPU Core Frequency
counter.description: Average GPU Core Frequency in the measurement.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: VS Threads Dispatched
counter.description: The total number of vertex shader hardware threads dispatched.

counter.name: HS Threads Dispatched
counter.description: The total number of hull shader hardware threads dispatched.

counter.name: DS Threads Dispatched
counter.description: The total number of domain shader hardware threads dispatched.

counter.name: GS Threads Dispatched
counter.description: The total number of geometry shader hardware threads dispatched.

counter.name: FS Threads Dispatched
counter.description: The total number of fragment shader hardware threads dispatched.

counter.name: CS Threads Dispatched
counter.description: The total number of compute shader hardware threads dispatched.

counter.name: GPU Busy
counter.description: The percentage of time in which the GPU has been processing GPU commands.

counter.name: EU Active
counter.description: The percentage of time in which the Execution Units were actively processing.
counter.equation: A 7 READ A 8 READ FADD A 9 READ FADD A 10 READ FADD $EuCoresTotalCount UDIV 100 UMUL $GpuCoreClocks FDIV
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier2 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: EU Stall
counter.description: The percentage of time in which the Execution Units were stalled.
counter.equation: A 11 READ A 12 READ FADD A 13 READ FADD A 14 READ FADD $EuCoresTotalCount UDIV 100 UMUL $GpuCoreClocks FDIV
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier2 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: EU Thread Occupancy
counter.description: The percentage of time in which hardware threads occupied EUs.
counter.equation: 8 A 15 READ A 16 READ FADD A 17 READ FADD A 18 READ FADD FMUL $EuThreadsCount FDIV $EuCoresTotalCount UDIV 100 UMUL $GpuCoreClocks FDIV
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier2 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: Sampler00 Busy
counter.description: The percentage of time in which Slice0 Sampler0 has been processing EU requests.

counter.name: Sampler Slice0 Dualsubslice0 is bottleneck
counter.description: The percentage of time when sampler slice0 dualsubslice0 is bottleneck

counter.name: Samplers Busy
counter.description: The percentage of time in which samplers have been processing EU requests.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier2 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: Samplers Bottleneck
counter.description: The percentage of time in which samplers have been slowing down the pipe when processing EU requests.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier3 Overview Indicate System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: Rasterized Pixels
counter.description: The total number of rasterized pixels.

counter.name: Early Hi-Depth Test Fails
counter.description: The total number of pixels dropped on early hierarchical depth test.

counter.name: Early Depth Test Fails
counter.description: The total number of pixels dropped on early depth test.

counter.name: Samples Killed in FS
counter.description: The total number of samples or pixels dropped in fragment shaders.

counter.name: Pixels Failing Tests
counter.description: The total number of pixels dropped on post-FS alpha, stencil, or depth tests.

counter.name: Samples Written
counter.description: The total number of samples or pixels written to all render targets.

counter.name: Samples Blended
counter.description: The total number of blended samples or pixels written to all render targets.

counter.name: Sampler Texels
counter.description: The total number of texels seen on input (with 2x2 accuracy) in all sampler units.

counter.name: Sampler Texels Misses
counter.description: The total number of texels lookups (with 2x2 accuracy) that missed L1 sampler cache.

counter.name: SLM Bytes Read
counter.description: The total number of GPU memory bytes read from shared local memory.

counter.name: SLM Bytes Written
counter.description: The total number of GPU memory bytes written into shared local memory.

counter.name: Shader Memory Accesses
counter.description: The total number of shader memory accesses to L3.

counter.name: Shader Atomic Memory Accesses
counter.description: The total number of shader atomic memory accesses.

counter.name: L3 Shader Throughput
counter.description: The total number of GPU memory bytes transferred between shaders and L3 caches w/o URB.

counter.name: Shader Barrier Messages
counter.description: The total number of shader barrier messages.

counter.name: GTI Read Throughput
counter.description: The total number of GPU memory bytes read from GTI.
counter.equation: 64 C 5 READ C 4 READ UADD C 3 READ UADD C 2 READ UADD UMUL
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: GTI Write Throughput
counter.description: The total number of GPU memory bytes written to GTI.
counter.equation: 64 C 1 READ C 0 READ UADD UMUL
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: VF Bottleneck
counter.description: The percentage of time in which vertex fetch pipeline stage was slowing down the 3D pipeline.

counter.name: VS Bottleneck
counter.description: The percentage of time in which vertex shader pipeline stage was slowing down the 3D pipeline.

counter.name: HS Bottleneck
counter.description: The percentage of time in which hull shader pipeline stage was slowing down the 3D pipeline.

counter.name: DS Bottleneck
counter.description: The percentage of time in which domain shader pipeline stage was slowing down the 3D pipeline.

counter.name: GS Bottleneck
counter.description: The percentage of time in which geometry shader pipeline stage was slowing down the 3D pipeline.

counter.name: SO Bottleneck
counter.description: The percentage of time in which stream output pipeline stage was slowing down the 3D pipeline.

counter.name: Clipper Bottleneck
counter.description: The percentage of time in which clipper pipeline stage was slowing down the 3D pipeline.

counter.name: Strip-Fans Bottleneck
counter.description: The percentage of time in which strip-fans pipeline stage was slowing down the 3D pipeline.

counter.name: Hi-Depth Bottleneck
counter.description: The percentage of time in which early hierarchical depth test pipeline stage was slowing down the 3D pipeline.

counter.name: BC Bottleneck
counter.description: The percentage of time in which barycentric coordinates calculation pipeline stage was slowing down the 3D pipeline.

counter.name: HS Stall
counter.description: The percentage of time in which hull stall pipeline stage was stalled.

counter.description: The percentage of time in which domain shader pipeline stage was stalled.

counter.description: The percentage of time in which stream-output pipeline stage was stalled.

counter.description: The percentage of time in which clipper pipeline stage was stalled.

counter.name: SF Stall
counter.description: The percentage of time in which strip-fans pipeline stage was stalled.

counter.name: Slice0 Dualsubslice0 Non-sampler Shader Access Stalled On L3
counter.description: Percentage of time when HDC has messages to L3, but it's stalled due to lack of credits (Slice0 Dualsubslice0)
counter.equation: GPU_CLOCK 0 READ C 2 READ FSUB 100 UMUL $GpuCoreClocks FDIV

counter.name: Slice0 Dualsubslice1 Non-sampler Shader Access Stalled On L3
counter.description: Percentage of time when HDC has messages to L3, but it's stalled due to lack of credits (Slice0 Dualsubslice1)
counter.equation: GPU_CLOCK 0 READ C 3 READ FSUB 100 UMUL $GpuCoreClocks FDIV

counter.name: Slice0 Dualsubslice2 Non-sampler Shader Access Stalled On L3
counter.description: Percentage of time when HDC has messages to L3, but it's stalled due to lack of credits (Slice0 Dualsubslice2)
counter.equation: GPU_CLOCK 0 READ C 4 READ FSUB 100 UMUL $GpuCoreClocks FDIV

counter.name: Slice0 Dualsubslice3 Non-sampler Shader Access Stalled On L3
counter.description: Percentage of time when HDC has messages to L3, but it's stalled due to lack of credits (Slice0 Dualsubslice3)
counter.equation: GPU_CLOCK 0 READ C 5 READ FSUB 100 UMUL $GpuCoreClocks FDIV

counter.name: Slice0 Dualsubslice4 Non-sampler Shader Access Stalled On L3
counter.description: Percentage of time when HDC has messages to L3, but it's stalled due to lack of credits (Slice0 Dualsubslice4)
counter.equation: GPU_CLOCK 0 READ C 6 READ FSUB 100 UMUL $GpuCoreClocks FDIV

counter.name: Slice0 Dualsubslice5 Non-sampler Shader Access Stalled On L3
counter.description: Percentage of time when HDC has messages to L3, but it's stalled due to lack of credits (Slice0 Dualsubslice5)
counter.equation: GPU_CLOCK 0 READ C 7 READ FSUB 100 UMUL $GpuCoreClocks FDIV

counter.description: The total number of GPU memory bytes written to GTI.
counter.equation: 64 C 3 READ C 2 READ UADD UMUL

counter.name: GPU Time Elapsed
counter.description: Time elapsed on the GPU during the measurement.

counter.name: GPU Core Clocks
counter.description: The total number of GPU core clocks elapsed during the measurement.

counter.description: Average GPU Core Frequency in the measurement.

counter.name: GPU Busy
counter.description: The percentage of time in which the GPU has been processing GPU commands.

counter.name: VS Threads Dispatched
counter.description: The total number of vertex shader hardware threads dispatched.

counter.name: HS Threads Dispatched
counter.description: The total number of hull shader hardware threads dispatched.

counter.name: DS Threads Dispatched
counter.description: The total number of domain shader hardware threads dispatched.

counter.name: GS Threads Dispatched
counter.description: The total number of geometry shader hardware threads dispatched.

counter.name: FS Threads Dispatched
counter.description: The total number of fragment shader hardware threads dispatched.

counter.name: CS Threads Dispatched
counter.description: The total number of compute shader hardware threads dispatched.

counter.name: Render Ring Busy
counter.description: The percentage of time when render command streamer was busy.

counter.name: Compute Ring Busy
counter.description: The percentage of time when render command streamer was busy.

counter.name: Render and compute engines are simultaneously busy
counter.description: The percentage of time when render and compute engines are simultaneously busy

counter.name: GTI Read Throughput
counter.description: The total number of GPU memory bytes read from GTI.
counter.equation: 64 C 7 READ C 6 READ UADD C 5 READ UADD C 4 READ UADD UMUL

counter.name: GTI Write Throughput
counter.description: The total number of GPU memory bytes written to GTI.

counter.name: DS Send Pipe Active
counter.description: The percentage of time in which EU send pipeline was actively processing a domain shader instruction.
counter.equation: A 7 READ A 8 READ FADD A 9 READ FADD A 10 READ FADD $EuCoresTotalCount UDIV 100 UMUL $GpuCoreClocks FDIV
